==Translingual==

===Alternative forms===
* {{l|mul|㞡}}

===Etymology===
{{liushu|p}} – laying out goods for sale. The top [[尸]] is the roof, the middle is derived from [[㠭]] – four [[工]] shapes in a square (goods for sale), while the bottom is cognate to {{m|mul|衣||cloth|sc=Hani}} – an unfurled cloth, with goods on top (or the cloth itself for sale).

# [[stretch]], [[extend]]
